beers.description: Our bright and beautiful fresh orange juice pale ale.
beers.summary: Our bright and beautiful fresh orange juice pale ale.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #19. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #19. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of chocolate malt milkshakes, ripe stone fruit, marzipan, and sticky toffee pudding.
beers.description: Peach Tea Imperial Stout. 10.5% Brewed with a plethora of dark specialty malts and hopped in the kettle with just a handful of Czech Saaz. We then added a blend of green tea, honeybush and dried peaches and fermented in stainless for many moons. Brewed in collaboration with our basketball loving pals over at Dugges in Sweden.
beers.summary:
Peach Tea Imperial Stout. 10.5% Brewed with a plethora of dark specialty malts and hopped in the kettle with just a handful of Czech Saaz. We then added a blend of green tea, honeybush and dried peaches and fermented in stainless for many moons. Brewed in collaboration with our basketball loving pals over at Dugges in Sweden.
Notes of chocolate malt milkshakes, ripe stone fruit, marzipan, and sticky toffee pudding.

beers.notes: Notes of orange marmalade, dandelion greens, black peppercorn, and zippy acidity.
beers.description: Blended Saison. 4.9% Saison comprised of mature oak barrel fermented and conditioned saison and a young snappy stainless steel saison that was aggressively hopped in the kettle with Columbus lupulin powder.
beers.summary:
Blended Saison. 4.9% Saison comprised of mature oak barrel fermented and conditioned saison and a young snappy stainless steel saison that was aggressively hopped in the kettle with Columbus lupulin powder.
Notes of orange marmalade, dandelion greens, black peppercorn, and zippy acidity.

beers.notes: Notes of under ripe blackberries, campfire on the horizon, Ethiopian coffee, and juicy plum.
beers.description: Dark Cherry Saison. 5.5% Brewed with midnight wheat and a dash of beechwood smoked malt. Gently hopped in the kettle with Melba. Fermented in stainless steel and conditioned on copious amounts of tart and sweet cherry puree.
beers.summary:
Dark Cherry Saison. 5.5% Brewed with midnight wheat and a dash of beechwood smoked malt. Gently hopped in the kettle with Melba. Fermented in stainless steel and conditioned on copious amounts of tart and sweet cherry puree.
Notes of under ripe blackberries, campfire on the horizon, Ethiopian coffee, and juicy plum.

beers.notes: Notes of ripe kiwi, Bright red berries, Mellon balls, and tropical clouds.
beers.description: Pale Ale. 5.7% Brewed with pillowy oats. Hopped assertively in the kettle with Citra then aggressively dry hopped with Idaho7. Classic and life affirming.
beers.summary:
Pale Ale. 5.7% Brewed with pillowy oats. Hopped assertively in the kettle with Citra then aggressively dry hopped with Idaho7. Classic and life affirming.
Notes of ripe kiwi, Bright red berries, Mellon balls, and tropical clouds.

beers.notes: Notes of maple syrup, caramel brownies, creme brulee, and admiration of the past.
beers.description: Elder Ale 8.5% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malt. Boiled for an extended period of time and ever so gently hopped in the kettle with Loral. Fermented and conditioned in stainless for many moons. Cozy and heart-warming.
beers.summary:
Elder Ale 8.5% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malt. Boiled for an extended period of time and ever so gently hopped in the kettle with Loral. Fermented and conditioned in stainless for many moons. Cozy and heart-warming.
Notes of maple syrup, caramel brownies, creme brulee, and admiration of the past.

beers.notes: Notes of freshly squeezed citrus in a paper carton, sticky mango, overripe pineapple, and freshly mowed fairway.
beers.description: Blood Orange DIPA. 8.1% Brewed with gobs of fluffy oats. Hopped in the kettle with Centennial, then aggressively dry hopped with Citra and Crystal and conditioned atop vibrant blood orange puree.
beers.summary:
Blood Orange DIPA. 8.1% Brewed with gobs of fluffy oats. Hopped in the kettle with Centennial, then aggressively dry hopped with Citra and Crystal and conditioned atop vibrant blood orange puree.
Notes of freshly squeezed citrus in a paper carton, sticky mango, overripe pineapple, and freshly mowed fairway.
